title: Bengaluru Techie Loses Rs 11.8 Crore in 'Digital Arrest' Scam
article_description: A Bengaluru-based software engineer was defrauded of Rs 11.8 crore over a span of weeks by scammers posing as law enforcement officials, accusing him of involvement in illegal activities and coercing him into transferring funds to avoid arrest.
key_points: Scammers impersonated police officers.
Victim was accused of money laundering.
Coerced into transferring large sums to multiple accounts.

key_points: SEBI identified unauthorized platforms facilitating unlisted securities trading.
Investors warned against potential fraud risks.
Emphasis on using recognized stock exchanges for legitimate transactions.
